resources.string: requestCode in intent does not match the parent requestCode

string-array.name: game_description
string-array.item: Fighting game for up to 8 players in which fighters from Nintendo and other franchises try to knock each other from an arena.
Action adventure set in a western-theme. The player controls Arthur Morgan, an outlaw trying to fight for the freedom of his people.
Action role-playing game. The player controls the dragonborn as he attempts to defeat the dragon Alduin the World-Eater.
An open ended country life farming simulation game. The player must try to restore Stardew Valley to its former glory.
Action adventure in which the player controls Link, who awakens from a 100 year sleep to find the kingdom of hyrule is going to be destroyed by the evil Calamity Ganon.
